about_the_game:
While traveling through space you have been captured by a malevolent god who curses you with a new element that can restrict your movements, just to place you in this game for his own amusement, while he collapses the universe around you and plans for you to be at the center of it.

You will need to escape but to do so you will need to complete levels giving him no choice but to think up more elaborate stages that will hopefully distract him enough to break free from his curse.

Completing each stage earns you a score based on time remaining, once you complete 4 and 8 stages you will hit a checkpoint that will keep your score and lives remaining while on that level and when you finish all 10 stages you will receive a star based on your total score.

⦁ 3 Difficulties to choose from: Easy, Normal and Hard.
⦁ Highly recommend Easy or Normal as starting points.
⦁ Use all the elements to conquer the stages and finish a level.
⦁ Change elements simply by using the correct key or button.

⦁ Roll or Jump through gates and earn more time to pass stages, some can be worth more.


⦁ Climb different element ramps only with the correct element to reach higher levels.


⦁ In later levels start using the cursed element to get through stages.


⦁ Activate element colored jump platforms to reach much higher places.


⦁ Activate portals that move you around the stages and change your view.


⦁ Destroy an elemental to gain additional points.
⦁ Activate portals that move you around the stages and views.
⦁ Reverse and restore gravity to avoid time sucking pools and more.
⦁ Enter and Exit Zero G area's where you no longer roll but float.
⦁ Earn points to obtain stars to pass levels and gain extra lives.
⦁ Start on four 2D levels then move onto rolling through 2.5D stages.
⦁ Each level has mirrored stages with its own set of difficulties.
⦁ Change platform colors on all stages to something easier to see in game options.
⦁ Featuring over 150 total stages that you can practice.
⦁ and much more

Do your best to survive and escape.

You will need to escape but to do so you will need to complete levels giving him no choice but to think up more elaborate stages that will hopefully distract him enough to break free from his curse.

Completing each stage earns you a score based on time remaining, once you complete 4 and 8 stages you will hit a checkpoint that will keep your score and lives remaining while on that level and when you finish all 10 stages you will receive a star based on your total score.

⦁ 3 Difficulties to choose from: Easy, Normal and Hard.
⦁ Highly recommend Easy or Normal as starting points.
⦁ Use all the elements to conquer the stages and finish a level.
⦁ Change elements simply by using the correct key or button.

⦁ Roll or Jump through gates and earn more time to pass stages, some can be worth more.


⦁ Climb different element ramps only with the correct element to reach higher levels.


⦁ In later levels start using the cursed element to get through stages.


⦁ Activate element colored jump platforms to reach much higher places.


⦁ Activate portals that move you around the stages and change your view.

⦁ Activate portals that move you around the stages and views.
⦁ Reverse and restore gravity to avoid time sucking pools and more.
⦁ Enter and Exit Zero G area's where you no longer roll but float.
⦁ Earn points to obtain stars to pass levels and gain extra lives.
⦁ Start on four 2D levels then move onto rolling through 2.5D stages.
⦁ Each level has mirrored stages with its own set of difficulties.
⦁ Change platform colors on all stages to something easier to see in game options.
⦁ Featuring over 150 total stages that you can practice.
⦁ and much more

name: Elemgate

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel i5-6300HQ / AMD Ryzen 5 3550H or Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, Radeon RX 460 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 (64-bit version)
  • Processor: Intel i7-6700K / AMD Ryzen 7 1700 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 4GB /AMD R9 290X 4GB or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard

short_description: Elemgate is a unique precision platformer where you'll need to control your speed, changing of the elements and jump timing and to earn more time that converts into score needed to pass 10 stages per level and ultimately across 15 levels in this 2.5D obstacle course challenge to escape an evil god.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
